TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Tantares - Stockalike Soyuz and MIR [16.1][28.05.2024][{Proton Revamp]

Articles.Content:
That's the whole point of the deployAnimationController parameter. It disables extending and retracting while docked. My issue is that it disables the extend/retract ability too early, and you can't retract the probe to dock. So basically, you're just stuck in soft-dock.

This whole point is moot if I don't use the parameter, but it's dangerous for people who want to "experiment" with parts.

Hmm... and what if you use a larger acquire range for the docking ports and the docking nodes a bit inside to the model?

That means when you retract, they will dock eventually after the crafts where rubbing together after the probes where already retracted.

Progress Update

The famous (nobody every heard of or used) docking parachute.

This time around, two variants (with parachute and without).

Potentially without stripe.

http://www.astronautix.com/craft/tmk1.htm

try looking at astronautix

- - - Updated - - -

It would be launched on an N-1 first of all. Then when it got into LEO, it would perform TMI/TVI. Apparently it had a booster in the back fueled by Kerosene with 350 ISP and it made one major burn to get it on course. It'd drop the booster after TMI, flyby Mars, then come back with minor corrections with some sort of SPS. I think they relied on something similar Zubrin's mission plan with a 2 year free return on a 6 month transit. However, I've flown to Duna dozens of times. And I've simulated flybys but not once have I gotten an encounter with Kerbin almost instantaneously.

- - - Updated - - -

Hope this helps Beale.

Thanks!

Fuji Docking Port/Parachute feedback!

Is there any way the chute could come out the side of the port? It doesn't make too much sense to have it come out the center as I'm sure you're already aware. Heh. Not a huge deal either way.

Here's a useful album I put together from lesser-known Fuji reference material.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Most images are from a review done that ended up condemning the entire spacecraft. This should be useful for recreations, not as much for part creation.

Is there any way the Exploration Module could have REALLY large observation windows? The Fuji was meant to be used for tourism to an extent, so large windows would have been a priority.

Well I did remake it, kinda!

Though there is quite a bit of difference.

Perhaps yes, one day, a MonoProp engine would be a good idea!

http://puu.sh/l1c99/df1628c207.jpg

When you do remake it a 1.875 meter engine would be nice as we have no upper stage engines in that size currently...
I have a question, I'm not trying to be annoying or anything, But i've just looked at some of the early posts of this mod, And i would like to ask, Will there be legacy releases?

God those pics are gorgeous!!!!

Why isn't there a procedural LES?

God those pics are gorgeous!!!!

Why isn't there a procedural LES?

It's called procedural SRBs

Quick, everybody, look at the skeletons in Beale's closet!
Quick, everybody, look at the skeletons in Beale's closet!

http://i.imgur.com/wAJbj1K.jpg

Amazing.

When opening the TK-SM05B Service Module, everything overheats (and explodes without hax). Any ideas?

Edit: When closing, letting it cool, and reopening it, the overheating doesn't occur. Strange...(I have replicated this bug multiple times on the same craft. Maybe its quirk of the ship instead)

Fuji Docking Port/Parachute feedback!

http://i.imgur.com/EEdOPtY.jpg

Is there any way the chute could come out the side of the port? It doesn't make too much sense to have it come out the center as I'm sure you're already aware. Heh. Not a huge deal either way.

Here's a useful album I put together from lesser-known Fuji reference material.

http://imgur.com/a/alIkF

Most images are from a review done that ended up condemning the entire spacecraft. This should be useful for recreations, not as much for part creation.

Is there any way the Exploration Module could have REALLY large observation windows? The Fuji was meant to be used for tourism to an extent, so large windows would have been a priority.

I like it. And I'd say the striped one is better. It catches eye. Yeah, it's too thin, but for some reason that still works for me.

Nice feedback thanks!

Album helps visualize how it should all work together so also thanks!

Large window OM? I think this could be nice to have (And is a very easy IVA for "observation" module, big empty space!).

Other questions:

- Parachute needs to be centered, as it will always operate from centre of mass of part, no matter parachute transform position.

- Parafoil would look nice, I will experiment

- The final part will have a "cap" to cover the interior you see there, when parachute stowed.

- It's thin, but should be fine!

When you do remake it a 1.875 meter engine would be nice as we have no upper stage engines in that size currently...

Nice addition it will be yes

Beale, on the topic of 1.875m part balance in the tech tree - if I edit the configs for them to place them more appropriately, would you take a look at them?

if I edit the configs for them to place them more appropriately, would you take a look at them?

Fun to see old things!

Configs - yes of course, I am more than happy to take on tech-tree suggestions (I have never balanced it correctly, that much should be obvious ).

Hey all, TweakScale config has been updated.

Tantares TweakScale Config (v1.3) Dropbox Download

Short changes include more sizes, N1 scaling factors, and some tweaks and fixes.

I'll be absent from the forums for quite a while. If anyone wants to update the configs when Beale drops new parts on you all, please feel free. If you just look at the configs, you can figure out the way it works very quickly.

Cheers all.

In reply to Beale, By legacy release, i mean the updates that changed things, Like the old specter cockpit, I don't remember how it looked, but i know i liked it, Or stuff like this

Really, What i'm requesting is that you update some of the old versions of the mod where things were changed, or removed, Hopefully that isn't too big of a request,

And one last thing, Keep in mind i'm not demanding this, And i'm trying my best to not make too big of a request

Hmm, Well, I guess that explains why i forgot it Anyway, I have one little thing i'd like, Because it bugs the hell out of me, The soyuz part retexture basically renders certain parts useless, Because the colour contrast doesn't work, So my request is, Either a small tutorial on if i can have two different soyuz parts at once, Or, Maybe you could put together a couple green textures for the shenzhou and such, This may be asking too much, But i won't be upset or anything if you won't do it.
